tasks.title: Develop AI-powered Quiz Module
tasks.description: Design and implement an AI-powered quiz module to provide personalized quizzes for students.

tasks.title: Integrate Natural Language Processing (NLP)
tasks.description: Integrate NLP capabilities to enhance the assistant's ability to understand and respond to natural language queries.

tasks.title: Implement Student Progress Tracking
tasks.description: Develop a feature to track and analyze students' progress based on their interactions with the assistant.

tasks.title: Create Interactive Learning Modules
tasks.description: Design interactive learning modules using AI techniques to engage students and facilitate active learning.

tasks.title: Enhance Speech Recognition
tasks.description: Improve the assistant's speech recognition capabilities to accurately transcribe spoken words.

tasks.title: Optimize Recommendation Engine
tasks.description: Refine the recommendation engine to suggest personalized learning resources and study materials for students.

tasks.title: Implement Virtual Classroom Feature
tasks.description: Develop a virtual classroom feature to facilitate remote learning sessions and collaboration among students.

tasks.title: Create AI Tutoring System
tasks.description: Build an AI tutoring system to provide individualized tutoring sessions and assistance to students.

tasks.title: Integrate Plagiarism Checker
tasks.description: Integrate a plagiarism checker tool to help students ensure the originality of their academic work.

tasks.title: Develop Course Recommendation Algorithm
tasks.description: Develop an algorithm to recommend courses and learning paths tailored to each student's interests and learning goals.

tasks.title: Implement Student Feedback System
tasks.description: Create a system for collecting and analyzing student feedback to continuously improve the assistant's performance and features.

tasks.title: Enhance Accessibility Features
tasks.description: Improve accessibility features to ensure the assistant is usable by students with disabilities or special needs.

tasks.title: Integrate Learning Analytics Dashboard
tasks.description: Integrate a learning analytics dashboard to provide insights into students' learning behaviors and performance metrics.

tasks.title: Develop AI-based Essay Grading System
tasks.description: Develop an AI-based system for automatically grading essays and providing feedback to students.

tasks.title: Implement Personalized Study Plans
tasks.description: Implement personalized study plans based on students' learning styles, strengths, and weaknesses.

tasks.title: Integrate Real-time Language Translation
tasks.description: Integrate realtime languages translation capabilities to support multilingual students and educators.

tasks.title: Develop Gamification Features
tasks.description: Design and implement gamification features to incentivize student engagement and motivation.

tasks.title: Create AI-based Content Creation Tools
tasks.description: Develop AI-based tools for generating educational content, such as quizzes, exercises, and study guides.

tasks.title: Enhance User Interface and User Experience (UI/UX)
tasks.description: Improve the UI/UX design of the assistant to make it more intuitive and user-friendly for students and educators.
